braintree.repository
Class HashRepository

java.lang.Object
  braintree.repository.HashRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository
public class HashRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRepository

A repository implemented using a HashMap with card-holder name as key and a list of card(s) as values.

Author:
renus
